auth_code.title: Auth Code
auth_code.description: Wolken authentication code for Basic Auth

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: The number of records to request from the API per call.

api_timeout.title: API Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) to use when making requests to Wolken API. 0 means no timeout.

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Wolken API.

backfill.title: Backfill
backfill.description: Backfill data from the start date to the end date.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which to start syncing data.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date at which to stop syncing data.

configuration_items_type_ids.title: Configuration Items Type IDs
configuration_items_type_ids.description: Optional list of configuration item type IDs to filter by. If not provided, all configuration items will be fetched.

flex_field_user_lookup_names.title: Flex Field User Lookup Names
flex_field_user_lookup_names.description: Optional list of flex field names to be treated as user lookup refs, so that the users stream fetches their full details.
